sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import { ShopContext } from '../Context/ShopContext' import remove_icon from '../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png' import all_product from '../Assets/all_product' export const CartItems = () => { const{all_product,CartItems,removeFromCart} = useContext(ShopContext) return (

Products

Title

Pric

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ if(CartItems[e.id]>0){ return

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

{e.new_price*CartItems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart(e.id)}} src={remove_icon} alt="" />
} })}
) }
